!Priestess Glyvka: Our order steadfastly obeys Einhasad's will even in the face of persecution and chaos. We share with the nobility the desire to preserve order wherever possible. I ask you, adventurer: in obedience to the goddess, are you willing to prove yourself a servant of order? [Quest _134_TempleMissionary glyvka_q0134_03.htm|"Yes, I am ready."]
